content.detailedDescription:
While bringing trash cans to end of driveway, i looked up into the night sky and observed the constellation sagittarius. to the left of the constellation i noticed what appeared to be a very bright star. however it pulsated and changed directions very rapidly. i moved into the road, which was very dark with a clear line of sight away from tree branches, and noticed that it continued with this color and travel pattern. several aircraft flew in different directions, at what appeared to be much lower altitude, during the entire time of observation. 

i am convinced that this was no plane or helicopter, due to the rapid ability of the object to change directions constantly and stop. i then came inside my home and told me wife to accompany me to observe the ufo. we continued to observe the object for approximately 20 minutes. a neighbor came out to place his trash cans at the curb, and i called him over. he claimed to be a military pilot in the past and tried to explain it as one, at first. but when i pointed out the rapid direction of travel while not following a flight path, he couldn't explain it. 

i had my cell phone with me and for the first time, decided to try out the video taping function. at this point in time, i'm not sure that it recorded, but it enabled us to zoom in on the object. it was at that time that we could see the vivid colors pulsating on the surface of the orb, as well as in a ring that appeared around it. 

i came inside to get my video camcorder, but found the battery was not charged. at the time of this report, i'm not sure if i have the video on my cell phone, but will try to find out how to retrieve it by checking on line (its a company provided cell phone - motorola droid razr). 

i should mention that i had observed multiple ufo's in 1967, when i was 14 years old, which rapidly changed flight paths before bursting at high speed into space. i've often checked the night sky and haven't seen anything resembling a ufo until this point. 

i have prior law enforcement experience, with extensive observation and investigative skills while in the corporate security profession for over 35 years. this includes report writing and court testimony. so i have established total credibility throughout my career. i have also been a certified njsp certified security officer instructor since 2007.
content.summary: Pulsating orb with ring, changing colors rapidly. moving short distances rapidly in all directions.

content.detailedDescription:
1. was home eating.
2. simple desire to look at the sky
3. airplane or helicopter
4. brief apparition fading (turn off lights) gradually; thought to be a civil aircraft, but marvel to change the route and disapper gradually
5. not given importance, but when marvel was already too small to shoot
6. fading gradually.
content.summary: Brief apparition fading (turn off lights) gradually

content.detailedDescription: During the splendor in the grass festival in 2013, i observed what apeared to be an orange light some 50 feet above the ground, i am a security officer and was in a field to the north of the event waiting for walk in persons to enter the venue without buying tickets. this object flew over the top of me without sound and appeared to be only 50 or so feet above me but was actually less it had orange lights under it, i shone my torch on it but it picked up no known reflection. an hour later i saw to the south west orange lights in what appeared to be flares. but one would come out of the other.Etc. so i left my area of patrol and went to investigate.The area was some 400 metres from the stage areas that were blocked off to access except through selected doors. when i got there i noticed a light beyond the trees in a southerly direction, it went down slowly then back up, so i shone my torch onto it, it appeared to be over a mile away, however on closer inspection the next day during daylight it turned out to be less than half of that.I shone my torch onto it and flicked it on off. then turned it off. the object flicked on off. then i moved my torch in a cross like a plus sign and then a circle. i repeated this a few times and always switched my torch off.Then the object did the same, it slowly came out above the trees. we played these games for about half an hour then in front of me on ground level, two flashes very bright, an orange white colour flashed. on closer inspection the next day this is where there were small trees and leading into swampy grounds. i dared not go in there that night. so i continued to play with the light in the sky i did so for at least another hr, however i did notice from that time on which was the last 2 nights of the event that there was always 4 objects over the stage areas, i knew this as it was cloudy and they were well inside the confines of the clouds. 2014 i worked again at the same area, this time the falls festival, again these objects were seen, further away from my area but again near the stage area, again orange lighting, and rising from the ground up, it was reported on our radios by other guards that they were chinese flares, however they would rise slowly then their lights would go off, but you could still see just the illumination of the crafts with the naked eye for a further amount of time as they rose higher then into the clouds. no noise heard.This went on every night for the duration of the festival. i have seen to date now 114 ufo's
content.summary: Read ful description

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? waiting for a friend to get off work near birmingham al.
2. what made you first notice the object? bored and looking out the car window.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? like nothing i had ever seen before.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. there were 2 objects that appeared to be salvaging a 3rd object .
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i can���t remember much about that
6. how did you lose sight of the object? i don���t remember ,. anything more you will have to get in touch with me, some event are clear others not so much. i wish to learn more about what happened to me and my memories  and seek further proof of my experience
content.summary: 2 ufo's in possible salvage operation

content.detailedDescription: The ufo flew around alot
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Insignia,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings,  Other
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed north on fm 731 toward crowley at around 5:30 pm when about to pass the nw turn for hampton rd, i noticed an object hovering over the central crowley area. i kept an eye on it for about a minute, when i decided to then change lanes so i could get closer to the area a bit faster (slow traffic). as i glanced in my blind-spot and looked back at the road, after changing lanes, the object was gone. i then looked off into the west (setting sun) and noticed a tiny sparkling object headed due west. it appeared the object was reflecting the sunlight. 
after a few seconds the object made an evasive maneuver in a very sharp hook shape. the object left a contrail behind it (about twice the length of the object). the speed was very rapid and definitely not what modern aircraft could perform, especially with the sharp turns. 
after a minutes late, i could no longer see the object.
shortly after pulling into my neighborhood i saw the object again, hovering over the i-35 area (east). the object appeared to be landing but i could not tell for sure. 

that is the last i saw of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object hovering over crowley. extreme speed during movement

content.detailedDescription: I was on duty and was talking to an employee on site, when we could not help but notice a yellow opague round wobbly object falling from the sky just over the main office, where we were. this object fell, then stopped and immediately turned into a multi-colored striated cylinder of fire about the length of the main mill, that appeared about 1500 feet above the ground, both ends of which were perfectly and precisely contained within this structure, yet it appeared to emanate a great deal of noiseless energy as it headed in a northeast direction over my work site,emanating a neon green splattered rope of light as it disseminated just past the production area, as if disappearing into an opening in the clear night sky. i was surprised to see this object, but immediately reported this incident to law enforcement as i also had a witness and wanted to be sure that no fire was generated in the area, as part of my job involved fire prevention at the time. this event occurred within about 9-10 seconds. as an observer, i did not feel that this event affected me in any way.
content.summary: Opague yellow round wobbly object falling, stopped then changed into striated multi-colored cylinder each side precisely as if cut perfectly, emanating a green rope of splattered light as it dissipated into the clear night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject came out of his house and noticed tracks in the snow  75 feet long. multiple shapes, box shaped and triangles alternating with a sloop on both ends,  boomerang like shapes on either end.
no visible  footprints near the tracks. the tracks were about two inches deep. they lasted about twenty-four hours until snow melted. 
several of his friends also witnessed the tracks.The subject took pictures and drawings and will email to mufon hq
subject doesn't know where they came from and thought they were "remarkable"
subject does not feel fear or worry about the tracks
content.summary: Saw wierd tracks in the snow by  my house

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my grandmother at a nursing home in killen, al.  i went outside to smoke.  i was sitting in a porch swing under a tree and i noticed a bright white light to the east that had a red light that looked like it was revolving around the white light.  i watched it until i finished my cigarette, then i went and got my brother.  he saw it and he went and got my mother, father, sister and uncle and they all saw it.  some 40-50 miles away is redstone arsenal in huntsville, al.  it looked like it could have been hovering over the arsenal.  i had no idea what it was, but the red light wasn't blinking, so i knew it wasn't a known aircraft.  when we left, it was still where it was when i first saw it, so i do not know how long it was there after we left.
content.summary: I saw a bright white light  with a red light that looked like it revolved around the object.  it was in same place for ~2 hours.

content.detailedDescription: It was 11pm, my wife and i were star gazing,directly above us, approximately  15,000 feet heading due west was an immense spear like black triangular ufo, it had to pass over mt shasta ca enroute to us. it was at least three football fields in length. no lights no sound, flat black. it was so large that it appeared to be floating over us in slow motion, yet from about us to the horizon what about 7 seconds, amazing sight.  i felt an overwhelming feeling of , wow, youre finally here, it was a good feeling, two nights later, my during my sleep i had a,,,, being come through me and was told, that it was a pleadian scientific ship, here to counter the aftershocks of large quakes, january 2010, one was filmed over santiago chile, the usgs recorded a quake of 8.2, there it was, as we were told.  we have a lot of activity here, its the norm almost nightly, but this one was immense.  the youtube video has been removed. i had posted it on my fb account numberous times.  geoff faulkner
content.summary: Black triangular, elongated not symetrical, no lights, no sound, at least three football fields in length, wife witnessed also

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck beside my apartment after work one night.  i got off work at 11 pm, so it was around midnight.  i saw a very bright yellow-orange light pulsating in the sky to the south.  i have no idea how far away it was or what altitude it was at.  i had no idea what it was.  i am a pilot so i know more about things that fly than the average person.  it pulsated 4 or 5 times then it ejected 2 or 3 smaller similar colored objects and then it just disappeared.  i was dumbfounded!  i knew i had seen something extraordinary, but to this day it concerns me as to what it was.
content.summary: Bright yellow-orange pulsating light emitted 2 or 3 objects, same color, but smaller, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:15pm my  husband i went outside to smoke and heard a jet in the sky, which is not uncommon for our area due to the close proximity to nellis air force base. when we looked up we saw around 15 to 20 dim lights traveling together, they went around the same  speed as a plane and made no noise. they headed east towards to mountains and then we could hear another military jet in the sky. we walked down to the edge of our complex but the light were gone. we did observe around 7 to 8 blinking lights above the mountains, they were more scattered than the objects we seen a few minutes before. these ones were actually blinking and the ones earlier were faint lighting that did not blink and were more in a straight line. all night i could hear jets in the sky, which again is not uncommon for this area, lots of air traffic here. don't know if they were having a military exercise last night, because sometimes they do. or if this had something to do with the lights in the sky.
content.summary: 9:15pm 3/4/14 north las vegas- 15+ orblike objects traveling across sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was september 1997 in minden, germany
i left the house where i had lived, it was in the evening at 20:30 and it was dark and it was still. i walked to the trees and stood alone.  i looked up to the trees and between the two trees i saw the strange yellow lights. i stood far from the strange lights  20 meters. i looked  one minute at the strange yellow lights, then it goes out and five seconds later it turns red and goes out.
i heard no noise. it was mysterious.
content.summary: 20:30 at night saw yellow cigar light through trees for a minute then it turned red

content.detailedDescription: My and my friend were walking home back to my parents house. when i'm crossing my neighbor hood street when i looked up and saw this big ship. it was going id say 20-30mph almost hovering it was going so slow. the ship was just above the tree tops. it was rectangular in shape it almost looked like it had a bunch of different angles on the surface but i couldn't tell. but it also didnt appear completely flat.I couldn't really tell because the ship was almost pitch black we could barely tell it apart from the night sky.  in between me trying to observe it as quickly as possible. i'm yelling to my friend "do you see that?!?!" he replied "yes". i could have ran through the bushes to keep looking at it because the trees cut off our sight. but for some reason both of us didn't think to do so.
content.summary: Late night friend and i are walking across my neighbor hood road. when i look up i saw a huge ship flying above the tree tops.

content.detailedDescription:
Last summer we were at the park right by my house and it was night and i seen what looked like a star move a little change colors so i alerted people i was with and they observed the same thing.  there were multiple fake stars out that night.  i did not get any video of these sightings.  i started looking for these bright fake stars and every time i look up if its a clear night i can pick them out and start filming them.  i got my camcorder out a couple of nights ago because there was one in the sky right above my house. i have some really good video you need to look at.  i can film these things just about every night.  they mimic stars but are too bright to be stars so i zoomed in on one and omg.  give me a call because i need to find out what's going on up there.

we were at home and it was about seven when i said you know what i got the camcorder set up lets see if anything up in the sky and sure enough there was one up there flashing so i got my camcorder and started filming.  i never lost sight of the objects because i feel they're mimicking stars i called and reported the first time from the park but i see them all the time!!!!  probably nightly if i wanted.  i'll be filming them tonight with a better camcorder.  i do have good film of both of these objects at 150x hd zoom.  i don't know what to think about the whole thing.  i know we're not alone.
content.summary: I see these things in the sky moving and changing colors so i took video

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work last night..Passed by a church on my right,then coming up by the convenience store(left side of road) right up from the church,saw what i thought was a star on left side above a hill.Remembering that it was cloudy,i said to myself,thats no star.When i first saw it,approximately a mile away,maybe less,it was about the size of a basketball maybe a little larger(as i got closer,it was about the size of like a large sized storage shed.)it then descended behind a hill.As i drove closer to where it was,saw it in the trees above a house.Unsure whether it landed as i was a little spooked,having saw the same thing where i work(10/25/2013)beside lake lure,and wanted to get home before the kids went to bed..Wish i would've stopped in retrospect.It emitted a bright yellowish glow and then as got closer was more orangish,appeared to be circular but could have been a different shape as the light was so bright,the shape was undiscernable.Also,when i first saw it,i was near the county line for rutherford/mcdowell counties on montford cove road.Would attach a map of the area,but have not figured out how yet..
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a star,but it was cloudy so knew it was not star,it then descended.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of february 28th at around 2330 hrs. i heard an argument in the community behind my houee. i looked out the window and was shocked to see 4 glowing orbs in the sky. i looked for a light beam coming from the ground and there was none. these orbs woulr come together into one larger orb. they would remain as one for 2 to 3 seconds then split into 4 separate orbs make a clover leaf path and then meet back in position that i saw them. their speeds was faster than any jet that i have seen. what is odd is this happened over andrews afb. i tried to record and did catch 2 of the orbs. i stopped taping afters a few seconds because i thought it was too dark and they were moving at high speeds. i also woke my wife so there would be more than one person to verify what was seen. a few days later when i checked the film you can see 2 of the orbs briefly.
content.summary: Ufo's over clinton, md on 2-28-14

content.detailedDescription:
We live within a mile of palm beach international airport and we frequently sit at night outside by our pool. the pool has no enclosure so i typically relax with a cigar and watch various small aircraft move overhead. we have seen small jets, helicopters, high atitude commerical and military flights,shooting stars, satellites, a rocket launch or two, the international space station, even a chinese lantern. 
on this night, like many others, my wife was playing a game on her ipad while i relaxed in a reclining pool deck chair and star gazed with a cigar. i suddenly noticed that a star (for want of a better term) that had been stationary began moving slowly due east. i asked my wife to verify that this "star" was moving because i really wanted a witness to verify i that i wasn't hallucinating. after all, stars do not suddenly move. after helping her locate it, she agreed that it was moving. it continued to move due east for a few more seconds and then it came to a stop and began to fade. we both got the impression it was ascending upward and within a few more seconds it had completely vanished.
content.summary: Star that moved east, hovered, then ascended

content.detailedDescription: It was between 9 and 10 pm on moose creek road when i saw diamond shape with bright white lights landing on near by hill as i watched i thought damn keep forgetting to put binoculars in truck all of a sudden not as long as a minute but not as fast as a blink of a eye it seemed the whole world got black, well scared the @#$% out of me and i left.The second time was up high deck  coming out of friends driveway and it was right there she said what is that why is it so big and why is it so close. i said i'm not waiting for you to close the gate were out of here
content.summary: diamond shape white lights while landing. then just showed up across from friends gate

content.detailedDescription: we just returned last night from a week stay in cancun. we had an ocean front room,(facing the east) and left our balcony doors open each night to hear the surf. our first night in cancun, we went to bed early, tired from our travel from ohio. we awoke about 3:45 am to see a beautiful crescent shape moon out our balcony, and a brilliant shining star called altair above it. we use our ipad skyguide app. to see what constellations are around, satellites, etc. at first, i thought i was watching a shooting star. it appeared rapidly from the north (on our left) and shot by quickly, but suddenly stopped just below the constellation scorpio, backtracked a little ways, then began zig-zagging all around until it finally sped off to the south. within moments another object, which had the same soft orange glow as the first, appeared from out of nowhere above us, stopped in mid-flight, changed course, and began to zig-zag before flying off. i tried to video and photograph using my ipad but they were so far they looked grainy on the screen, and were way too fast for me to follow. another orb appeared as the first two, and shot off in an erratic manner. we were stunned at what we'd seen and sat on the wall of our balcony searching for more, when suddenly two appeared, flying in tandem, much closer to us than the others, and much slower. we could see these more clearly and they looked like they were orange, transparent orbs with whirling wings. they made no sound, and moved steadily along, then zipped off down the coast. they reminded me of two big dragonflies, sort of, but in a mechanical way. it was as if the first 3 were testing us, knowing we were watching, and then the last two came closer to show off a little. my boyfriend is a usaf veteran, and he said what we saw were definitely ufos. they were not planes, satellites, drones, helicopters, searchlights, balloons or anything else. we were so excited and so amazed by what we've seen. we have told all the people who were on the trip with us, but no one else was up at that time so they missed it. it has made us both even more sure we are not alone in this vast universe! one of just many universes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared rapidly from the north (on our left) and shot by quickly, but suddenly stopped just below the constellation scorpio, backtracked a little ways, then began zig-zagging all around until it finally sped off to the south.

content.detailedDescription: We observed a very faint curved white line moving slowly in the sky up above our heads. it had a strange path, going up and down, left to right. we watched it for about 20 seconds until it disappeared behind a tree. about 3 minutes later a low flying army helicopter flew above our apartments with its search light on, in the direction of the tree that the object disappeared behind.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved slowly around sky getting closer to ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my hottub laying back on a corner pillow when i heard a noise from above me, like the air in the sky was separating kind of like when a flag flapps in the wind i can't explain it but when i heard it i opened my eyes to look up and just then the craft came into my view over the edge of my roof. i kind of just freaked out at first cause i didn't know what to make of it at first it just floated over me and my house and then sort of slowed down. it was triangular in shape and did not make a sound, i was kind of waiting to hear engine thrusters or some kind of noise when it passed over me. it went right over the town i am surprised no one else spotted it. it was really low but just dark enough if you weren't looking up at that moment you wouldn't even have known. i just happened to be laying back and when i heard the change in the air pressure i opened my eyes and there it was. i thought i had seen an alien craft but i am pretty sure that it it the tr3b astra. the direction it was flying would have taken it towards kirtland afb or sandia labs. there were commercial aircraft either landing or taking off at the time but were probably too far away to notice. it was getting more dark than light at the time and if i had not been looking up at that time i would not have seen it at all. there were some amber colored lights on the bottom real dim light like on the older cars when they first came out with headlights. definitely a triangle craft. it was huge to be going so slow without falling out of the sky. then it went into the darkness. i have cameras but was so surprised i didn't even think about running in to get it. it happened so fast i was just in awe of what i was seeing and then it was gone. but i know i saw it and i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Ufo flew right over my head and i watched it dissappear into the darkness.

content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten into the car when i spotted a bright orange light in the sky. i was curious because of a previous unidentified object i had seen last year. the ball of light was not moving. it seemed to just hover, i would have guessed it was mars at first. we stopped the car and watched the light, which is when it began to move. it moved to the left and then took a slight turn down. then it made a u-turn and was going the opposite direction in the sky. then it moved to the right, down, and turned the other direction again. and then it turned back to the right and then shot up into the clouds and out of view at a very high speed. it looked like the size of a pencil eraser from where i was observing it, but the light was very bright.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Took u-turn twice, moved down about 100 feet, then shot up into atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: On 4 march 2014,at 18:15, my wife observed, to the east from wendy's, a dark craft with triangular wings hovering in the distance.  the craft was cigar shaped with triangular wings.  the color was dark with metalic or dull silver wings.  the craft had two lights, like landing lights, shinning, but was not a airplane.  it hovered the whole time she observed it.  she also saw other people in their cars pointing and looking at the craft.  do to the icy conditions, she did not pull over and take pictures.
content.summary: Wife observed craft hovering behind the local wendyy's, had dark thick body with triangular wings.  had bright lights shinning.  craft hovered in same place.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were in the backyard ob newyears eve.We were burning wood.We saw bright orange red like objects flying in the sky.I could see the light reflecting off the bottom of a cloud on one occasion.The objects all dissapeared behind trees when we could not see them.They for the most part went in a straight path but occasionally would make broad changes in path.We later experienced perception errors.For example,we were talking a stack of chairs at one point,and dad looks over at them and makes the comment that he sees three chairs stacked up.I knew this was wrong and i corrected him.He insists that there was three,and i look and i see three. but then as i move closer there are only two as i originally believed.I had an eerie feeling the rest of the night.I took footage on my phone,but all i got was a black screen.
content.summary: Four glowing balls flying in the sky dissapeared behind trees as if they we were watching

content.detailedDescription:
Could not sleep so i went out to have a smoke. looking at the stars and noticed 3 lights together. at first i thought it was landing lights as a airport is nearby. then thought it was a helicopter from the coast guard, as i live by the gulf of mexico. lights did not move for over 20 minutes and do not know of any helicopter that can hold station that long. lights were as bright as landing lights size of my thumb at arms length. no sound was heard. location is south of venice florida. as it was dark i could only guess distance about 1 mile. no sound was heard and where i am it is easy to here all aircraft in area taking off or landing. i was puzzled by the sighting and hesitated to report it. and i am hoping mufon can give me an answer.Lights were in a very slight triangle, 2 white on left side and slightly offset red light all the same size and brightness. they never moved the entire time, bearing wsw. no picture taken because of lack of light to get a good photo, and viewed through binoculars could not see outline because of how bright lights were. 10/50 binoculars. i am reporting this because you have also had reports from venice florida which is about 30 miles north of my location.
   orion was high up about 45 and object was about 10 degrees.
content.summary: At arms lenght was the size of my thumpnail left 2 lights white right red. thought it was a helicopter but howered with no noise for over 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday september 17, 2014 -  bowdoinham, maine - i observed a green "flare" like orb kind of falling in a light arc toward my backyard (a hay field).  i thought it may have been fireworks and was worried the field would be set on fire. i checked outside, visually, from 3 areas, and hollered out into the darkness from all 3 locations - but it was clear, no one was outside.  it's a very rural area, everyone knows everyone out here.  if someone was outside they'd have hollered back when i yelled to see if anyone was out there.


directly after observing this event, i posted to facebook that i saw this green thing falling quite slowly from the sky, and a friend of mine said it was bizarre that someone she knows in the next town over (richmond, maine) saw, pretty much, what i explained i observed and facebooked it almost at the same exact time.  the falling "flare" or "orb", or whatever it was, in my yard was so low there is no way this person in another town was looking at what i was looking at.

i went out to the hayfield to check what it was that fell, but could find nothing.  


so there were 2 witnesses to at least 1, maybe 2, green-light "flare" like "orbs" in the air on the same night at the same general time.  i say "in the air" and not "in the sky" because, really, this thing was lower than the trees - it was within the trees and falling toward the ground - when i saw it.



this same type of event happened again roughly 5 months later - sunday february 23, 2014 -  around midnight and was observed by 2 different people and also in 2 different towns.  it was seen in richmond, maine and reported on facebook, and a friend responded to this report by saying they also observed a green flare like orb in bowdoin, maine at roughly the same time.


in addition:

i'm not sure if it's related, but a few years earlier (less than 10 years earlier) i saw an orange spotlight hanging in the sky over the trees just beyond the hayfield this green flare/orb fell in.  i honestly thought nothing of this spotlight - i thought it was something normal, like a helicopter or something, maybe with police in it and they were looking for people?  it just never occurred to me it was weird, until our garage motion light was triggered by us opening the garage door.  when the motion lights flashed on in the yard, i was still looking at this orange spotlight, and i observed it go from a completely standstill position - it was literally just stuck there in the sky, no movement and no sound (we was in our truck at the time, driving into our driveway.  i rolled down my window and verbalized it was weird there was no sounds from helicopter blades.) - to instantly streaking across the sky and zipping completely out of sight in the direction of bowdoin/topsham/brunswick/freeport... 

i have no idea what that was.  i can only say that's what i saw. i didn't talk out loud about it to too many people but luckily those i did tell read the paper.  there was an article in the portland press herald (i'm pretty sure that was the paper) that was specifically about ufo sightings all over different parts of maine that week.  one of the reports was pretty much what i saw, which was this orange spotlight.  the town that happened in, i think, was norridgewock, and that's quite a far distance from bowdoinham.  


and now these green orbs are falling in, and around, these towns, and people are reporting their movement as somewhat intelligent in-nature because they aren't always just "falling".  they've been reported to zig-zag and take direct turns.  

so i thought i'd post it here and maybe someone from this area of maine will chime in and report any sightings they may have had.
content.summary: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]   - a few years earlier i saw an orange

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bathroom and i looked out the window.I thought it was the moon in a cresant reflection.But it was too small to be the moon.I watched it for a few minutes.Even though i knew it was too small to be the moon.I finally went back to bed and forgot about it.A couple of days later while on the before its news website,i saw a news cast video where they were talking about it.They showed a photo of it.And i realized that it was the object i saw.I posted the story on my face book page.
content.summary: Orb moonlike

content.detailedDescription: On march 01, 2014 i was outside under my back patio around 7:30pm. it was lightly raining and as i was watching the rain i was looking north east between my neighbors house and the empty lot next to him where i could see the northeast sky without any obstruction. as i was looking in that direction all of a sudden 5 evenly spaced bright red lights lit up for about five seconds then blinked off. this was just slightly above the rooftop level of the neighbors house 200 feet away and to the right of it where the empty lot is. it was about 15 degrees elevation and at a bearing from my back patio of 75 degrees. my impression was that it was no more then a block or two away just from the way the light intensity was and because it was drizzling rain at the time. the lights appeared to be in a horizontal line. in between the lights there was just darkness so as to appear to me that they were individual lights and not lights attached to an object. it did not appear to be moving but instead just appeared and disappeared like somebody turned on and off a light switch. the lights kind of reminded me of christmas type lights but in the morning i used my binoculars to see if my neighbor had any lights on their upper patio deck which they did not.
content.summary: Five red lights blinked on for 5 seconds then off

content.detailedDescription: I was a volunteer fire fighter / emt at a rural fire dept in dexter oregon. i pulled overnight "duty shifts" once a month. i had a 30 minute drive to my house, before getting ready for work @ 5am. so it was between 3-4am when i headed to my car to leave. i was the only one on duty that night. i always look at the sky in dexter because it's out of the city and i see all the stars. i stood there looking for a minute, and i noticed a bright white light in the sky. it was moving in a straight line and was not moving at an alarming speed. i watched it for a few seconds and got in my car and turned it on. i sat there a moment thinking to myself. "airplanes usually have green, red, and sometimes blue lights; usually with a strobe white light to go with. i turned my car off and got back out, feeling a little more nervous. my heart started racing. the light didn't blink, pulse or anything. i'd seen many satellites cross the sky and this was not one. it was quite bigger. if i held out my hand, it would be just a tad smaller than a bb from a pellet gun, so, bigger than any star in the sky. i stood there for a solid 2 minutes it must have been. it never altered course or speed. i watched it move from a westerly position to a southern position. basically if you drew a circle on the ground around my body, it would have moved 45 degrees. it looked to be the altitude or perhaps just lower than normal air traffic. we do have an airport near by but it's a small one ; eugene airport. i couldn't tell the objects size or distance from me, but it felt close. it looked to be between 30-40 degrees from the horizon. still watching the light, it started to dim rather quickly, then it blinked, and vanished. it was almost directly due south at that point. i stood there for at least another two minutes, frantically scanning the area around where i'd lost sight of it, hoping to see it reappear. all i could hear was the sounds of the leaves blowing in the breeze. whatever it was never reappeared. there were no obstructions to block my view. the sky was wide open for my viewing. when the idea hit me that what i saw might not be a plane, or a helicopter i felt very uneasy. i fumbled my keys, and got my car running. i think i may have skidded my tires a little bit upon leaving the parking lot. i'd always wanted to see a ufo, but when the possibility was upon me, i was pretty startled and a little shaken.
content.summary: Watched light move then disappear.
